instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-4924: What is 820-4924? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4924</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> bad <CHIP>U8330</CHIP>, can't find replacement
threads.message: Any pointers as to a reliable source for parts? Checked mailin.repair and mouser but this chip is not supplied on one and not in stock on the other.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4924</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> bad <CHIP>U8330</CHIP>, can't find replacement
threads.message: buy donor boards from aliexpress like rest fo us...

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4924</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> bad <CHIP>U8330</CHIP>, can't find replacement
threads.message: I'd still like to have some good sources of components in case I don't have or can't find a good donor board.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4924</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> bad <CHIP>U8330</CHIP>, can't find replacement
threads.message: you can buy that specific part. 74LVC2G32GT from aliexpress as well.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4924</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> bad <CHIP>U8330</CHIP>, can't find replacement
<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4924</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> bad <CHIP>U8330</CHIP>, can't find replacement
threads.message: Donor boards are the best source and can also be found on Ali.
